title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 302-2.5 - Preparation, punctuality and expedition
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 302-2.5 - Preparation, punctuality and expedition

State Regulations
A representative shall: (a) thoroughly investigate and prepare his
case; and
(b) be punctual and ready
to proceed at hearings and avoid undue delay in the trial of the case by
submitting all available evidence as promptly and fully as possible. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
302-2.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
